dublin_core.dcvalue: The purposes of this study were to identify the functional requirements of and to build the data model for a PDA DSS Through Use Case Analysis and UML modeling seven Use Cases were documented and Use Case Diagrams Activity Diagrams and Sequence Diagrams related to the management of were developed
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
Functional requirements specification and data modeling for a PDA-based decision support system for the screening and management of obesity.
